gentle_rain.name: Gentle Rain
gentle_rain.description: A soft, steady rain falls across the forest, calming tensions and enhancing peaceful magic.

morning_mist.name: Morning Mist
morning_mist.description: Thick mist rolls through the forest, reducing visibility but providing cover for stealthy approaches.

forest_wind.name: Forest Wind
forest_wind.description: Strong winds rustle through the trees, making movement more difficult but carrying whispers of nature's wisdom.

sunbeam_clearing.name: Sunbeam Clearing
sunbeam_clearing.description: Brilliant sunbeams pierce through the canopy, energizing all forest dwellers and boosting natural magic.

twilight_calm.name: Twilight Calm
twilight_calm.description: A serene stillness settles over the forest as day transitions to night, promoting peaceful resolution.

crystal_frost.name: Crystal Frost
crystal_frost.description: Delicate frost crystals form on leaves and bark, slowing movement but sharpening focus and awareness.
